ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(gupshupcrm__What_s_App_Channel_Type__c , 'Self-Serve'),OR( ISBLANK( gupshupcrm__Business_Number__c ), ISBLANK( gupshupcrm__Apikey__c ), ISBLANK( gupshupcrm__Appname__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill required fields App Name, API Key and WhatsApp Business Number
